Deutsch: Zhoubi suanjing (`是~`一部~`中~国较`早~`的~数学专业书`籍~ - 《`算~术`十~经》`之~`一~)  (Eig, Math)
English: Zhou Bi Suan Jing, or Chou Pei Suan Ching, one of the oldest Chinese texts on astronomy and mathematics
